methods.description:
sets up the Bindable or Component. It will inject the required injections and
also will bind the application wide `MessageBus` to all methods annotated with the
`.bus()` method annotation

For `Components` the setUp method is invoked automatically during the add of the Component.
For non `Components`
methods.name: _setUp

methods.description:
tears down the Bindable or Component. It will remove the injected variables and
also will unbind the annotated event handlers from the application wide `MessageBus`
methods.name: _tearDown

scrollContainerHeight.name: scrollContainerHeight
scrollContainerHeight.description: TODO: read from content, provide refresh method

selected.name: selected
selected.description: If not null, false or undefined the "active" CSS class is added

selectable.name: selectable
selectable.description: If not null, false or undefined a click will set the element to selected

heightUpdatePolicy.name: heightUpdatePolicy
heightUpdatePolicy.description:
The heightUpdatePolicy configures whether the height of the component is
updated when the DOM node height changes or if the DOM node height is updated
when the component height changes.

**Possible values:**

+  **in** - "height" attribute is determined by DOM nodes offsetHeight
+  **out** - DOM node height is determined by the "height" attribute
+  **both** - both directions

widthUpdatePolicy.name: widthUpdatePolicy
widthUpdatePolicy.description:
The widthUpdatePolicy configures whether the width of the component is
updated when the DOM node width changes or if the DOM node width is updated
when the component width changes.

**Possible values:**

+  **in** - "width" attribute is determined by DOM nodes offsetWidth
+  **out** - DOM node width is determined by the "width" attribute
+  **both** - both directions

class.name: class
class.description:
sets the class for the Component.
The resulting class attributes is the union from class and componentClass of the Element.

componentClass.name: componentClass
componentClass.description:
sets the componentClass for the Component.
The resulting class attributes is the union from class and componentClass of the Element.

visible.name: visible
visible.description: sets the visibility of an component. If the value is false the component is removed from the DOM.

cid.name: cid
cid.description:
the cid is a unique identifier for the component within a xaml class. \
The corresponding component will be automatically added to the $ of the instance of the xaml class.

creationPolicy.name: creationPolicy
creationPolicy.description: Decides if the initialization of the component is started automatically or manually by the application
